thread.section_title: Lyft Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lyft | www.lyft.com | 3 of 104
thread.title: Taylor Whitehouse

author: Taylor Whitehouse
title: Taylor Whitehouse
text:
Honestly, I think we should be assisted with maintenance and tire replacement, with considerable discounts on gas. There is way too much liability on our vehicles. I think the Lyft Line system is completely flawed and should only be available during peak hours. People should be able to request a lyft line to someplace an far away where no one is going, because the driver assumes too much cost and liability for practically no return. That seems very unfair.
Not quite sure how people survive doing this full time. Other then that, it's an alright gig.
